text:
October 25, 1968
Mr, Richard Cavell
Business Manager
Corporation for Public Broadcasting
545 Madison Avenue
New York, New York
Dear Mr# Cavell:
Enclosed are a list of expenses incurred in con¬
nection with the Conference on Public Radio held
October 22-24 at the Motel on the Mountain, Suf¬
fer n, New York.
Available receipts are attached.
Reimbursement should be made directly to the under¬
signed.
Sincerely,
RAMilkl
Enclosur es
Robert A. Mott
